event.name: AEA_MODIFY_CLONEBAY
event.text: The Dark Justicier can illegally modify your clone bay. [Effects: Clone bay no longer clones dead crew, on jump modified clone bay produces two random illegal clones who have a death timer of 30 seconds, modified clone bay prevents death timers from progressing while powered.]
The existing clone bay is partially deconstructed in order to make way for the upgrades.
The changes are made and you are left with a modifier clonebay.

event.name: AEA_JUSTICIER_FIGHT_ONE
event.text: You've arrived in the middle of what was the rebel fleet to discover it destroyed. A large red battleship unlike you've ever seen before sits in the middle of the debree field. Unfortunately it turns it's attention to you, weapons armed.

event.name: DESTROYED_JUSTICE_BATTLESHIP
event.text: The ship fragments and explodes, as it does you detect an energy pulse, resembling that from a teleportation system, from the vessel. You scrap the remains of the ship.

event.name: DEAD_CREW_JUSTICE_BATTLESHIP
event.text: As the last of the crew fall dead, you recall that just before you were able to kill the mysterious captain of the vessel, they teleported away. You scrap the remains of the ship.

event.name: AEA_JUSTICIER_FIGHT_TWO
event.text: Once again you've arrived in the middle of what was the rebel fleet to discover it destroyed. A large red battleship unlike you've ever seen before sits in the middle of the debree field. Unfortunately it turns it's attention to you, weapons armed.

event.name: DESTROYED_JUSTICE_CRUISER
event.text: The ship fragments and explodes, A strange person teleports onboard your ship. "Renegade, you've proven yourself quite the capable combatant, however my god hungers for blood for which I cannot fulfill without a ship. Perhaps I can operate on board your vessel for a time?"
The dark justicier joins the crew.
They once again teleport away, where they went you're unsure.

event.name: DEAD_CREW_JUSTICE_CRUISER
event.text: As the last of the crew fall dead, A strange person teleports onboard your ship. "Renegade, you've proven yourself quite the capable combatant, however my god hungers for blood for which I cannot fulfill without a ship. Perhaps I can operate on board your vessel for a time?"
The dark justicier joins the crew.
They once again teleport away, where they went you're unsure.

event.name: AEA_FLEET_WRECK_ELITE
event.text: The remnants of a destroyed rebel fleet lie here, however you have no time to search it as reinforcements have arrived!

choice.text: (Adv. Engines) Try to escape the Elite.
